name: Eat it! (treesAreOp, circuitbree, Neisha)
description:
Eat it! is a small Tower Defense game where the player has to  prevent wasting food as long as possible. You need to keep the delecious Food from going to waste! You need to achive your goal by cleverly placing Kitchen equipment at the right time and the right spot!

  1. If you cannot process the food it will be thrown away. How many Waves of food can you save? How to Play: - Buy food processing stations from the lower menu - Drag them onto the desired position (if a station can not be placed at a position the small rectangle at the bottom of the tower turns red) - Process as much food as possible! Hints: - You can move stations around even during a wave!
  2.  Change the target of a station by clicking on one and selecting a dfifferent target type!

Team:

  • Jenny Neuhard @Neisha
  • Adrian Bernhart @TreesAreOp
  • Yoshua Neuhard @Circuitbree
  • Alexander Haumann 

Assets:

  • Kenney Assets

Thanks for playing our second entry for the Ludum Dare 50 game jam! We love participating in game jams, being able to get lots of ideas into actual prototypes and little games. We are in the process of starting out as a little indie company called "Coffee Scream Studio". Check out our website: coffee-scream.studio! We plan to release our first little mobile game this year (2022)!
